data.question: How does purchasing on Apps Store benefit your players?
data.answer: In Apps Store, players can purchase game items at lower prices, find some special offers, and claim free rewards. Moreover, there’s a variety of payment options available, allowing your players to choose the most convenient one for their purchases.

data.question: Is it safe to purchase on Apps Store?
data.answer: Web Store which refers to the highest level of compliance with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard. Therefore, all payments made on Web Shop are completely secure.

data.question: What payment methods does Apps Store support?
data.answer: Web Store currently accepts payments via most popular credit/debit card brands and digital wallets. All available payment options can be viewed on the payment page.

data.question: Who can help your players with purchase issues?
data.answer: Who can help your players with purchase issues?
